name: Sky Dice
description:
A special take on the "Roll of the dice" theme for the GMTK Jam 2022. The distance covered by the dice is determined by the number of dots on the top face of the die! There are a total of 6 levels. One playthrough is no longer than 10 minutes. 

Created by me (swordstrike1). Most assets including sound and models are hand-made! The levels we're a challenge to design but I think I managed to grasp quite a bit of it.

If the web version does not work, you can download binary below!

Controls

- WASD for controlling the die.
- Mouse for rotating left and right for a better angle.
- R to restart the level.
